root.name: NCIS
root.description: This is the first game for the popular crime scene investigation show NCIS.The game includes a total of four new NCIS episodes created by the writers of the TV show. The episodes are also connected so in the end you'll uncover the whole story and find out exactly what is going on.You'll find yourself traveling across America and to other locations around the globe to solve espionage, murders and even terrorist cases controlling the characters from the TV series.Each member of the team has a unique skill set allocated to them.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP (SP3) / Windows Vista (SP2) / Windows 7 (SP1)Processor: 3 GHz Pentium 4 or AMD Athlon64 3000+ or better (3 GHz Intel Pentium D or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4000+ or higher recommended)RAM: 1 GBVideo Card: 256 MB DirectX 9.0-compliant card ATI Radeon X 1650 or NVIDIA GeForce 6800Sound Card: DirectX 9.0-compliant sound cardDirectX Version: DirectX 9.0cHard Drive Space: 4 GBRecommendedOS: Windows Vista/7Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.66 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 @ 2.8 GHzRAM: 3 GBVideo Card: nVidia GeForce GTS 250 / ATI Radeon HD 5750Sound Card: DirectX 9.0-compliant sound cardHard Drive Space: 10 GB
